storyInfo: A Liberi, by the name of Patia, shows up to wrest Cecelia away, but considers herself a protector. She says, 'If you truly care about Cecelia, then don't give her up to the Notarial Hall or the Lateran.'

attributes.content: So you're able to move around without your wheelchair now?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Yes, I've been rehabilitating pretty well.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Last year, they had a wheelchair rapid-firing contest, which I won... and then the doctors banned me from competing again.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: We'd have to look for a Gun-Knight to beat your firing skills, I think.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Aww, that's nice to hear.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I'd be even happier if SOMEONE learned how to say a few nice words to the sick, like my darling Fiammetta here.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Mostima, are you just going to stand there pretending you're the curtains?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You know I'm not the type, Lemuen.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What type? This is your first time back in two or three years. My memory's not that good.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Fine. Lemuen fires better than anyone I know. Her skills are incredible.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mm-hm, that's more like it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Is El doing alright in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I saw her recently. She's doing great.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You'd better worry about yourself before her.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And I'll copy those words right back at you.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: How long are you going to stay this time?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Dunno, really. But it'll be at least until the conference's over, Wednesday after next, I think?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Tuesday after.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Oh, Tuesday. Otherwise, it's up to how that old weirdo feels. Who knows if he'll send me on some weird and wacky assignment again.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Did you just call His Holiness...?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: He's not gonna mind, Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If you want to stay for a bit longer, I could help you there.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That so.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Did you figure it out already?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Figure what out? What are you two talking about?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Did you really not realize, Fiammetta?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Who we've been handing our reports to for the last half year?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Was it that obvious?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Wh-What...? Wait, Lemuen... you got a job at the Lateran Church? While you're still in rehab...?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's just some secretary work.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: How long will you stick with it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm not sure yet.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Will you return to the Guard?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Little chance of that now.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Your marksmanship, overlooked just like that... it's a mind-boggling waste.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You judge me so highly, Fiammetta, even though I messed it all up.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: That wasn't your fault.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And it wasn't yours either.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Don't stretch yourself too thin.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The day will come when I settle the matter with him.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Oh, well. Mostima...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Can I rub your horns?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Spoilsport.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Lemuen gazes out the window as Mostima stands beside it, idly playing with the flowers in her hands.
In a flash, Fiammetta returns to a time before.
The sun shines ever bright and beautiful during a Lateran springtime, and a hint of chill rides the air.
Through the window, she spots the roofs of church buildings large and small. Here and there, now and then, fowlbeasts streak across the sky.
Lemuen is peaceful in any ordinary time, occasionally uttering a remark or two. Around her, the atmosphere softens.
The standoffish Mostima relaxes without realizing, unable to sense the smile she lets slip.
Just as always.
As if none of it ever happened.
But it's only an illusion.
After that night, not a night more could she soundly sleep.
Lemuen...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Something's on my mind, Lemuen.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Does this hospital have all that many volunteers?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hm? I suppose.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Seniora Lemuen, I want you to look at this...
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: Oh, you have visitors?
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: It's alright, they're old war buddies of mine.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: War buddies... you don't mean—!
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: In that case, maybe all three of you could take a look at these test results...
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: Oren, do you know what you're doing?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Maybe you'll be kind enough to tell me?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: She's not going to think of your methods as just 'personal conduct.'
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: She'll be thinking we're going out of our way to exhibit 'the Lateran stance.'
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Slip up for a moment and this becomes a diplomatic incident.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Isn't that exactly what you want?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Conflict leads to issues, issues require resolution, resolution needs a channel.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Laterano's providing a whole new way to resolve issues.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And we provide this method under two prerequisites—what we say has to carry enough weight, and what we say has to be 'appropriate'.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Right, Laterano needs to have an 'appropriate stance.' If all we brought to the table was an ordinary roll of the dice, who'd need Laterano?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: —Wouldn't you say, Your Holiness?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Do you agree with him, Vel?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: He's pretending to be smart.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The reason Laterano stands upon this land, and the reason the Legati can cross all borders, is that Laterano possesses faith.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No, it's because of Laterano itself that the Legati are given passage, Your Eminence.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We all know clear as day that the true Lateran faith can't reach beyond the Sankta. I'm sorry, but it might let you down if you count on it to get things done.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oren, if you seek death, you can apply through the proper channels.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Truthfully, I've never understood how you two manage to fight so much.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: When I set out on my way back from Victoria to Laterano, Duke Gododdin asked me a question, and I believe it's not one I'm equipped to answer.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: He asked: 'Does anywhere in Laterano suffice to draw me there?'
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Your Holiness, when we're sat at the playing table, will the cards in our hand be enough?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Your Holiness, Mostima wishes to speak with you.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: She states that what she must report cannot be heard by any other.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Then we'll step outta your hair.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You may go.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Put her through.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Time sure does fly, Your Holiness.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: A good while, my child. Is Lemuen well?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: No hiding anything from you.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We've seen something interesting here at this hospital.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: I saw the results of a physical checkup, and some of the signs look verrrry familiar.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Say no more before you return to the Basilica, Mostima.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Understood. Fiammetta'll go find the person these results belong to.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I know the hospital Lemuen's recovering at is in... Pagus Stevonus.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Stevonus.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Something that'd make Mostima use a dedicated line...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh, quit messing with me.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Cecelia, do you feel alright?
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: My head really hurt before... It's a bit better now.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: In that case, I'll carry you out.
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Out...? Who are you?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: We're your companions, Cecelia. There's someone waiting for you.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Mamma?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'm afraid it's not her.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Your mother won't come back, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I can't explain it to you.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: But someone can. I'll take you to see him.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Miss, but I want to find Mamma first.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'm really not good with kids. Sorry, Cecelia, whether you want to or not, I have to bring you away. You aren't safe here.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Cecelia!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Grr, too quick...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Who are you? What are you doing with Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Not for you to know, Sankta.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Cecelia was a companion of ours from the start. You're the one stealing her away.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: In that case, please tell me her parents' family name, her home address, identity number, and your blood or legal relationship to her.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ugh, Notarial Hall brainrot.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: If you have proper grounds to leave with Cecelia, you can tell me, and I'll take it into account in my decision.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: If you were a Liberi, I'd consider it. But Sankta like you... no chance.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You bear the Lateran symbol. You're a Liberi of Laterano yourself. Why hate the Sankta?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Lemme tell you something, you Notarial Hall scumbag.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The thing I hate second most in my life is when people like you—selfishly assume—it has to be a law of nature that every Liberi who lives in Laterano gets along great with Sankta!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: If you don't plan on elucidating your grounds, I won't let you take Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Not your call.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I'll hold him off. You take Cecelia.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Sorry, Cecelia. Just bear with it.
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: ...I don't want to.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: What's happening?! What was that explosion? And the smoke?!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: The window...! It must've been when...
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: There was a strong gust of wind just now. I'll close the window, in case she'd catch a cold.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Goddamned executor!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I'll give you a word of advice! If you truly care about Cecelia, then don't give her up to the Notarial Hall or the Lateran Church! Or else, you'll regret it!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Cecelia, hold on tight.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Good. We need to break free of them, then.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is he going to listen...?
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Of course he won't. Sankta are a bunch of happy-go-lucky idiots, but the ones at the Notarial Hall don't even get the 'happy-go-lucky' part.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Whether he listens or not, we need to ensure Cecelia is... in our hands before we can proceed.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Then we need to notify the others ASAP.
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Already done.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: While I was talking to him just now.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Ooh—you wanted to hold him up so you could send word out...
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: He can't outrun us.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Why was the door to this ward open?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Wh... Is that you, Patia?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Was there an eight-year-old Sankta girl staying in this ward?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I heard an explosion on the way here. Did you have something to do with that?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What's so weird about explosions in Laterano?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Are you really the Patia I know?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fiammetta. The girl you're looking for's already out of hospital.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: (She's definitely not here...)
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Why are you here?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What, you get to show up in Stevonus Central Hospital, but I don't?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Are the Guard looking for this girl too? Where'd you get this information?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I left the Pontifica Cohors long ago. Weren't you off being a Legatus's bodyguard? What, now you're back in Laterano again looking for some Sankta girl?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Don't you just love being surrounded by Sankta?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Liberi like you are all...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Patia. What's happened to you since I left?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Don't ask that like you actually care.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Enough. You don't need to talk to me like that.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If the girl's not here, I don't need to waste any more time with you either.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Forget what happened to me. You should be wondering just what you're doing, Fiammetta... Miss Veteran.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Tsk-tsk, Patia. Here I thought you loved your precious Fiammetta. Here you are with her again of all the things, and this is how cruel you treat her?
What's it to you? And what about the Notarial Hall kid? What's your plan?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Don't get so gruff, Patia. I might have an even better solution.
But I'll need another small favor from you.
